Items.MatterName: Community board member training, appointment dates, and qualifications.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to eliminating certain reporting requirements selected for waiver by the report and advisory board review commission and amending certain outdated and unnecessary reports and studies, to repeal section 19-184 of such code, relating to an interagency roadway safety plan, to repeal section 19-180 of such code, relating to a performance indicators city mobility report, to repeal subdivision c of section 19-183 of such code, relating to a report on the number of requests for changes in traffic flow, to repeal section 25-208 of such code, relating to a report on variances and special permits, to amend subdivisions i, j, and k of such charter, relating to a report on agency compliance with local laws 126, 127, and 128 of 2016, and repealing subdivision g of section 24-163.3, relating to a report on the use of ultra-low sulfur diesel fuel and best available retrofit technology by the city’s owned or leased diesel fuel-powered non-road vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminating certain reporting requirements selected for waiver by the report and advisory board review commission and amending certain outdated and unnecessary reports and studies.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the Report and Advisory Board Review Commission’s determination recommending waiver or partial waivers of six reporting requirements that was communicated to the City Council on December 23, 2024.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Approving the Report and Advisory Board Review Commission’s determination recommending waiver or partial waivers of six reporting requirements that was communicated to the City Council on December 23, 2024.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring borough presidents to provide trainings on legislative processes and rules of parliamentary procedure to local entities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring borough presidents to provide trainings on legislative processes and rules of parliamentary procedure to local entities.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the Report and Advisory Board Review Commission’s determination recommending waiver or partial waivers of six reporting requirements that was communicated to the City Council on December 23, 2024.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Approving the Report and Advisory Board Review Commission’s determination recommending waiver or partial waivers of six reporting requirements that was communicated to the City Council on December 23, 2024.
